I'm Paul McFreely & I'm a Freelance Developper from France

I create Web Applications, using Ruby, Sinatra and Rails.

I write from time to time

Here is what I can do for you :

Web Apps

You need help with the creation or maintenance of your web application? You're exited about your new idea but don't know how it can come to life ?
I can help you with that.

Prototypes

You have an idea for the next big thing(tm) but you're not sure if it will be successful?
I can create a prototype for you in a few weeks and help you test your idea.

E-Commerce Websites

You've created a realy nice product or brand, but you're not sure how to sell it online?
I can work with you to choose the best solution and develop it.

Batteries Included :

Some of the elements that all the projects I work on embody

Repsonsivity

I devellop all my projects with usability in mind. Today this mean being accessible on all devices, be it desktop or mobile. I take a great care to offer a wonderful experience on both platforms.

Reliability

All my projects are solid-proof against the hardship of a real life audience. They are tested and maintained to face a great deal of stress. And if something goes wrong, I will fix it quickly and solidly.
